short_description: This function gives score according to linear regression model.
long_description: The LinRegPredict function takes a model built by the Linear Regression function and a test data set whose input attributes are the same as those in the model, and predicts the response variable for each observation in the test data set.

input_tables.name: model
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the model table from linreg for the prediction
input_tables.description: Specifies the model table from linreg for the prediction

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input table columns that contain the input variables.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input table columns that contain the input variables.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of input table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of input table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: UniqueId
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
